other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis without contrast
other_tests.findings: The extensive inflammatory changes surrounding the sigmoid colon noted on the prior study have undergone considerable interval improvement, with only very mild residual mesenteric fat stranding. Moderate diverticulosis is noted, with no new focus of inflammatory change. No free air or free fluid in the abdomen or pelvis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Considerable interval improvement in inflammatory changes; no new focus of inflammatory change noted.
